events.title: Opening Ceremonies
events.description: The opening ceremonies will begin on Friday, and will be held in the McMurtry Quad.
events.caption: McMurtry Quad and Commons

events.title: Welcome Dinner
events.description: The welcome dinner will begin immediately following the opening ceremonies. It will be held in the mcmurtry commons, and will be catered by west servery
events.caption: McMurtry Commons
